Text.Page: You made a dish and gave it to Melsa.

Welcome back, ! Came back to Rootstock for some more fun, eh?

Any chance you can you come back later? I'm kind of swamped; we ran out of food last night, so I need to make a lot more today."Anything I can do to help?"
Oh, my! Are you sure? Yes! Absolutely! I already know you're a great cook, <PCNAME>, so you'd be a big help!
For now, I don't need anything too complex—but I don't have time to do it myself. <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Just tell me what you need."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Popped cobseed was extra-popular yesterday, so how about you make up a batch of that?
The mudroot salad went over really well, so I could use some more of that!
Pigling is always a big hit. Fire up the grill!

Oh my, that's some savory cobseed! Nice and salty, too, so we'll sell a lot of root beer with this!

Hey, , since you helped me, let me give you this. You can use it anytime. "I didn’t do much."
Don't forget: Always keep the recipe handy, and you can't go wrong!

You made enough mudroot salad to feed an army, ! Good work!

Listen: Since you helped me, let me give you this. You can use it anytime. "I didn’t do much."
When in doubt, always check the recipe.

I don't know what it is about monster fights that makes people hungry for grilled pigling, but this should satisfy them!

Hey, , since you helped me, let me give you this. You can use it anytime. "I didn’t do much."
When in doubt, check the recipe. That's my secret!
